properties.description: Run dataflow with Explicit copy to ingest copy source
Connection to your data source store.
Connection to your data destination store.
Connection to your source data store.

transformations.name: MapDriftProduct
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		ListPrice as double,
		Size as string,
		Weight as double,
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as date,
		SellEndDate as date,
		DiscontinuedDate as date,
		ThumbNailPhoto as string,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Product
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductCategory
source(output(
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Description as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductDescription
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CatalogDescription as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductModel
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Culture as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductModelProductDescription
source(output(
		Column_1 as integer,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Address
source(output(
		Column_1 as integer,
		Column_2 as boolean,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customer
source(output(
		CustomerID as long,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		Hashkey as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimCustomer
source(output(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		Hashkey as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimAddress
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ModelName as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		Size as string,
		ListPrice as double,
		StandardCost as double,
		Weight as double,
		SellEndDateID as timestamp,
		SellStartDateID as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDateID as string,
		ModifiedDateID as timestamp,
		DescriptionCultureAr as string,
		DescriptionCultureEn as string,
		DescriptionCultureFr as string,
		DescriptionCultureHe as string,
		DescriptionCultureTh as string,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} as string,
		InsertedDate as string,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimProduct
ProductModelProductDescription, ProductDescription join(ProductModelProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID == ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdDescandProdModProdDesc
Product, ProductCategory join(Product@ProductCategoryID == ProductCategory@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdandProdCat
ProductModel, JoinProdandProdCat join(ProductModel@ProductModelID == Product@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdModandProdProdCat
JoinProdModandProdProdCat, JoinProdDescandProdModProdDesc join(ProductModel@ProductModelID == ProductModelProductDescription@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct select(mapColumn(
		ProductModelID = ProductModel@ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID = ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
		ProductCategoryID = Product@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductID,
		ProductModelID = ProductModel@ProductModelID,
		ModelName = ProductModel@Name,
		CatalogDescription,
		ProductName = Product@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		SellStartDateID = SellStartDate,
		SellEndDateID = SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDateID = DiscontinuedDate,
		ModifiedDateID = Product@ModifiedDate,
		ProductCategoryName = ProductCategory@Name,
		Culture,
		Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProduct
SelectProduct pivot(groupBy(Description),
	pivotBy(Culture),
	DescriptionCulture = max(Description),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> PivotProduct
PivotProduct derive(DescriptionCultureAr = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturear    ')),
		DescriptionCultureEn = toString(byName('DescriptionCultureen    ')),
		DescriptionCultureFr = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturefr    ')),
		DescriptionCultureHe = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturehe    ')),
		DescriptionCultureTh = toString(byName('DescriptionCultureth    ')),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturezh-cht'))) ~> MapDriftProduct
MapDriftProduct, SelectProduct join(PivotProduct@Description == SelectProduct@Description,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct1
JoinProduct1 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID),
	DescriptionCultureAr = max(DescriptionCultureAr),
		{DescriptionCultureEn    } = max(DescriptionCultureEn),
		{DescriptionCultureFr   } = max(DescriptionCultureFr),
		DescriptionCultureHe = max(DescriptionCultureHe),
		DescriptionCultureTh = max(DescriptionCultureTh),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = max({DescriptionCultureZh-cht})) ~> AggProdDesc
AggProdDesc, SelectProduct join(AggProdDesc@ProductID == SelectProduct@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct2
JoinProduct2 select(mapColumn(
		ProductID = SelectProduct@ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID,
		DescriptionCultureAr,
		{DescriptionCultureEn    },
		{DescriptionCultureFr   },
		DescriptionCultureHe,
		DescriptionCultureTh,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht},
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		ProductCategoryName,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellStartDateID,
		SellEndDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProduct2
SelectProduct2 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductCategoryName,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellEndDateID,
		SellStartDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID),
	DescriptionCultureAr = max(DescriptionCultureAr),
		{DescriptionCultureEn    } = max({DescriptionCultureEn    }),
		{DescriptionCultureFr    } = max({DescriptionCultureFr   }),
		DescriptionCultureHe = max(DescriptionCultureHe),
		DescriptionCultureTh = max(DescriptionCultureTh),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = max({DescriptionCultureZh-cht})) ~> AggProduct
Customer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Column_1,
		NameStyle = Column_2,
		Title = Column_3,
		FirstName = Column_4,
		MiddleName = Column_5,
		LastName = Column_6,
		Suffix = Column_7,
		CompanyName = Column_8,
		SalesPerson = Column_9,
		EmailAddress = Column_10,
		Phone = Column_11,
		PasswordHash = Column_12,
		PasswordSalt = Column_13,
		InsertedDate = Column_15
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCustomer
SelectCustomer derive(HashKey = sha2(256, iifNull(Title,'') +FirstName +iifNull(MiddleName,'') +LastName +iifNull(Suffix,'') +iifNull(CompanyName,'') +iifNull(SalesPerson,'') +iifNull(EmailAddress,'') +iifNull(Phone,''))) ~> CreateCustomerHash
CreateCustomerHash, DimCustomer exists(CreateCustomerHash@HashKey == DimCustomer@Hashkey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists, DimCustomer lookup(SelectCustomer@CustomerID == DimCustomer@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCustomerID
LookupCustomerID derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(SelectCustomer@InsertedDate), currentDate(), SelectCustomer@InsertedDate),
		ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetDates
SetDates alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpserts
Address select(mapColumn(
		AddressID = Column_1,
		AddressLine1 = Column_2,
		AddressLine2 = Column_3,
		City = Column_4,
		StateProvince = Column_5,
		CountryRegion = Column_6,
		PostalCode = Column_7,
		InsertedDate = Column_9
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAddress
SelectProductAgg derive(HashKey = sha2(256, iifNull(ProductName,'')  
+iifNull(ProductCategoryName,'') 
+iifNull(ModelName,'')
+iifNull(Color,'') 
+iifNull(DescriptionCultureAr,'') 
+iifNull(DescriptionCultureEn,'') 
+iifNull(DescriptionCultureFr,'') 
+iifNull(DescriptionCultureHe,'') 
+iifNull(DescriptionCultureTh,'') 
+iifNull({DescriptionCultureZh-cht},''))) ~> CreateProductHash
CreateProductHash, DimProduct exists(CreateProductHash@HashKey == DimProduct@HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsProduct
ExistsProduct, DimProduct lookup(SelectProductAgg@ProductID == DimProduct@ProductID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupProdID
LookupProdID derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(SelectProductAgg@InsertedDate), 
currentDate(), SelectProductAgg@InsertedDate),
		ModifiedDateID = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetDatesProduct
SetDatesProduct alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsertsProduct
SelectAddress derive(HashKey = sha2(256, iifNull(AddressLine1,'') 
+iifNull(AddressLine2,'')  
+iifNull(City,'') 
+iifNull(StateProvince,'')  
+iifNull(CountryRegion,'') 
+iifNull(PostalCode,''))) ~> CreateAddressHash
CreateAddressHash, DimAddress exists(SelectAddress@AddressID == DimAddress@AddressID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsAddress
ExistsAddress, DimAddress lookup(SelectAddress@AddressID == DimAddress@AddressID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupAddressID
LookupAddressID derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(SelectAddress@InsertedDate), 
currentDate(), SelectAddress@InsertedDate),
		ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetDatesAddress
SetDatesAddress alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsertsAddress
AggProduct select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductCategoryName,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellEndDateID,
		SellStartDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		InsertedDate = ModifiedDateID,
		DescriptionCultureAr,
		DescriptionCultureEn = {DescriptionCultureEn    },
		DescriptionCultureFr = {DescriptionCultureFr    },
		DescriptionCultureHe,
		DescriptionCultureTh,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductAgg
AllowUpsertsProduct sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ProductID as integer,
		ModelName as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		Size as string,
		ListPrice as double,
		StandardCost as double,
		Weight as double,
		SellEndDateID as timestamp,
		SellStartDateID as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDateID as string,
		ModifiedDateID as timestamp,
		DescriptionCultureAr as string,
		DescriptionCultureEn as string,
		DescriptionCultureFr as string,
		DescriptionCultureHe as string,
		DescriptionCultureTh as string,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} as string,
		InsertedDate as string,
		HashKey as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = SelectProductAgg@ProductID,
		ModelName = SelectProductAgg@ModelName,
		ProductName = SelectProductAgg@ProductName,
		Color = SelectProductAgg@Color,
		ProductNumber = SelectProductAgg@ProductNumber,
		ProductCategoryName = SelectProductAgg@ProductCategoryName,
		Size = SelectProductAgg@Size,
		ListPrice = SelectProductAgg@ListPrice,
		StandardCost = SelectProductAgg@StandardCost,
		Weight = SelectProductAgg@Weight,
		DescriptionCultureAr = SelectProductAgg@DescriptionCultureAr,
		DescriptionCultureEn = SelectProductAgg@DescriptionCultureEn,
		DescriptionCultureFr = SelectProductAgg@DescriptionCultureFr,
		DescriptionCultureHe = SelectProductAgg@DescriptionCultureHe,
		DescriptionCultureTh = SelectProductAgg@DescriptionCultureTh,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = SelectProductAgg@{DescriptionCultureZh-cht},
		SellStartDateID = SelectProductAgg@SellStartDateID,
		SellEndDateID = SelectProductAgg@SellEndDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID = SelectProductAgg@DiscontinuedDateID,
		InsertedDate,
		HashKey = CreateProductHash@HashKey,
		ModifiedDateID
	)) ~> SinkProduct
AllowUpserts sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SelectCustomer@CustomerID,
		Title = SelectCustomer@Title,
		FirstName = SelectCustomer@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SelectCustomer@MiddleName,
		LastName = SelectCustomer@LastName,
		Suffix = SelectCustomer@Suffix,
		CompanyName = SelectCustomer@CompanyName,
		SalesPerson = SelectCustomer@SalesPerson,
		EmailAddress = SelectCustomer@EmailAddress,
		Phone = SelectCustomer@Phone,
		PasswordHash = SelectCustomer@PasswordHash,
		PasswordSalt = SelectCustomer@PasswordSalt,
		InsertedDate,
		Hashkey = CreateCustomerHash@HashKey,
		ModifiedDate
	)) ~> SinkCustomer
AllowUpsertsAddress sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		Hashkey as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['AddressID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		AddressID = SelectAddress@AddressID,
		AddressLine1 = SelectAddress@AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2 = SelectAddress@AddressLine2,
		City = SelectAddress@City,
		StateProvince = SelectAddress@StateProvince,
		CountryRegion = SelectAddress@CountryRegion,
		PostalCode = SelectAddress@PostalCode,
		InsertedDate,
		Hashkey = CreateAddressHash@HashKey,
		ModifiedDate
	)) ~> SinkAddress

source(output(
		DateID as date,
		Date as date,
		Day as string,
		Month as string,
		Year as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Date
source(output(
		CustomerID as long,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		Hashkey as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Customer
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as short,
		OrderDate as date,
		DueDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		Status as short,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as double,
		TaxAmt as double,
		Freight as double,
		TotalDue as double,
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SOH
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as short,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as double,
		UnitPriceDiscount as double,
		LineTotal as double,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SOD
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ModelName as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		Size as string,
		ListPrice as double,
		StandardCost as double,
		Weight as double,
		SellEndDateID as timestamp,
		SellStartDateID as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDateID as string,
		ModifiedDateID as timestamp,
		DescriptionCultureAr as string,
		DescriptionCultureEn as string,
		DescriptionCultureFr as string,
		DescriptionCultureHe as string,
		DescriptionCultureTh as string,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} as string,
		InsertedDate as string,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Product
source(output(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		Hashkey as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Address
SOH, Customer join(SOH@CustomerID == Customer@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomer
JoinShipAddress select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID = OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID = Customer@CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID = AddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = SOH@ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOH
SOHSelect, Date join(DueDate == DateID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDueDate
JoinDueDate select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOH1
SOD, Product join(SOD@ProductID == Product@ProductID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct, Date join(ModifiedDate == DateID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDate
JoinDate select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID = Product@ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		LineTotal,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDateID = ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOD
SelectSOD derive(ModifiedDateID = iif(isNull(ModifiedDateID), 
currentDate(), ModifiedDateID)) ~> SetDatesSOD
JoinCustomer, Address join(ShipToAddressID == AddressID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinShipAddress
SelectSOH, Address join(BillToAddressID == AddressID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinBillAddress
JoinBillAddress select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID = AddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = SelectSOH@ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SOHSelect
SelectSOH1 derive(ModifiedDate = iif(isNull(ModifiedDate), currentDate(), ModifiedDate)) ~> SetDatesSOH
SetDatesSOH sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		OrderDateID as date,
		DueDateID as date,
		ShipDateID as date,
		ModifiedDateID as date,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDateID = DueDate,
		ShipDateID = ShipDate,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		ModifiedDateID = ModifiedDate
	)) ~> sinkSOH
SetDatesSOD sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(19,4),
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		LineTotal,
		ModifiedDate = ModifiedDateID
	)) ~> sinkSOD

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'Customer_Dim' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'adventureworks_schema')
CREATE TABLE adventureworks_schema.Customer_Dim
	(
	 [CustomerID] bigint,
	 [Title] nvarchar(8),
	 [FirstName] nvarchar(50),
	 [MiddleName] nvarchar(50),
	 [LastName] nvarchar(50),
	 [Suffix] nvarchar(10),
	 [CompanyName] nvarchar(128),
	 [SalesPerson] nvarchar(256),
	 [EmailAddress] nvarchar(50),
	 [Phone] nvarchar(25),
	 [PasswordHash] varchar(128),
	 [PasswordSalt] varchar(10),
	 [ModifiedDate] datetime2(0)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	)
GO

COPY INTO adventureworks_schema.Customer_Dim
(CustomerID 1, Title 3, FirstName 4, MiddleName 5, LastName 6, Suffix 7, CompanyName 8, SalesPerson 9, EmailAddress 10, Phone 11, PasswordHash 12, PasswordSalt 13, ModifiedDate 15)
FROM 'https://adlgen2gradjhb.dfs.core.windows.net/dladventureworks/datalake/SalesLTCustomer'


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM adventureworks_schema.Customer_Dim

TRUNCATE TABLE adventureworks_schema.Date_Dim

DECLARE @CurrentDate DATE = '2010-05-01'
DECLARE @EndDate DATE = '2020-12-31'

WHILE @CurrentDate < @EndDate
BEGIN
INSERT INTO [adventureworks_schema].[Date_Dim](
[DateID]
,[Date]
,[Day]
,[Month]
,[Quarter]
,[Year]
)
SELECT [DateID] = @CurrentDate,
[Date] = @CurrentDate,
[Day] = DAY(@CurrentDate),
[Month] = MONTH(@CurrentDate),
[Quarter] = DATEPART(q, @CurrentDate),
[Year] = YEAR(@CurrentDate)
SET @CurrentDate = DATEADD(DD, 1, @CurrentDate)
END

SELECT * from adventureworks_schema.Date_Dim

CREATE PROCEDURE [adventureworks_schema].[PopulateDateDimensionForYear] @Year [int] AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#month', 'U') IS NOT NULL
        DROP TABLE #month
    CREATE TABLE #month (
        monthnum int,
        numofdays int
    )
    WITH ( DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN, heap )
    INSERT INTO #month
        SELECT 1, 31 UNION SELECT 2, CASE WHEN (@YEAR % 4 = 0 AND @YEAR % 100 <> 0) OR @YEAR % 400 = 0 THEN 29 ELSE 28 END UNION SELECT 3,31 UNION SELECT 4,30 UNION SELECT 5,31 UNION SELECT 6,30 UNION SELECT 7,31 UNION SELECT 8,31 UNION SELECT 9,30 UNION SELECT 10,31 UNION SELECT 11,30 UNION SELECT 12,31

    IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#days', 'U') IS NOT NULL
        DROP TABLE #days
    CREATE TABLE #days (days int)
    WITH (DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN, HEAP)

    INSERT INTO #days
        SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12 UNION SELECT 13 UNION SELECT 14 UNION SELECT 15 UNION SELECT 16 UNION SELECT 17 UNION SELECT 18 UNION SELECT 19 UNION SELECT 20    UNION SELECT 21 UNION SELECT 22 UNION SELECT 23 UNION SELECT 24 UNION SELECT 25 UNION SELECT 26 UNION SELECT 27 UNION SELECT 28 UNION SELECT 29 UNION SELECT 30 UNION SELECT 31

    INSERT [adventureworks_schema].[Date_Dim] (
       [DateID], [Date], [Day], [Month], [Year]
    )
    SELECT
        CAST(CAST(monthnum AS VARCHAR(2)) + '/' + CAST([days] AS VARCHAR(3)) + '/' + CAST(@year AS CHAR(4)) AS DATE) AS [DateID]
        ,CAST(CAST(monthnum AS VARCHAR(2)) + '/' + CAST([days] AS VARCHAR(3)) + '/' + CAST(@year AS CHAR(4)) AS DATE) AS [Date]
        ,CAST(DATENAME(day, CAST(CAST(monthnum AS VARCHAR(2)) + '/' + CAST([days] AS VARCHAR(3)) + '/' 
            + CAST(@year AS CHAR(4)) AS DATE)) AS NVARCHAR(10)) AS [Day]
        ,CAST(DATENAME(month, CAST(CAST(monthnum AS VARCHAR(2)) + '/' + CAST([days] AS VARCHAR(3)) 
            + '/' + CAST(@year as char(4)) AS DATE)) AS nvarchar(10)) AS [Month]
        ,CAST(@year as char(4)) AS [Year]
FROM #month m
    CROSS JOIN #days d
WHERE d.days <= m.numofdays

DROP table #month;
DROP table #days;
END;

DECLARE @Counter INT 
SET @Counter=2000
WHILE ( @Counter <= 2030)
BEGIN
    exec adventureworks_schema.PopulateDateDimensionForYear @Year = @Counter
    SET @Counter  = @Counter  + 1
END

SELECT * FROM [adventureworks_schema].[Date_Dim]
